title: Kris Jenner passes on Kim Kardashian's birthday for Jennifer Lawrence's wedding
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Kardashian matriarch Kris Jenner missed out on daughter Kim's 39th birthday celebrations.

Instead, she hit up the glitzy wedding bash of Hollywood megastar Jennifer Lawrence .

J-Law, 29, tied the knot with art dealer fiance Cooke Maroney, 34, in an extravagant Rhode Island ceremony.

Kris, 63, stunned in a black embellished gown as she mingled with the likes of Amy Schumer, Emma Stone, Adele and Sienna Miller.

Her co-mingler was boyfriend Corey Booker, 38, rocked a classic ensemble of black blazer and trousers, with a crisp white shirt underneath.

Second daughter Kim , meanwhile, was celebrating her 39th with an intimate family dinner.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The star, who's married to rap legend Kanye West , had her makeup done before the dinner by younger sister and cosmetics entrepreneur Kylie , 22.

Fans went mad back in February when the news broke of Jennifer's engagement to Cooke.

She told Catt Sandler's podcast that what she and Cooke have is the real deal.

(Image: Elder Ordonez / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Vogue)

The Oscar winner gushed: "I definitely wasn't at a place where I was like, 'I'm ready to get married.'

"I just met Cooke and I wanted to marry him. We wanted to marry each other.

"We wanted to commit fully. He's my best friend so I want to legally bind him to me forever. And fortunately the paperwork exists for such a thing.

"It's the greatest. You find your favourite person on the planet and you're like, 'You can't leave.' So I wanted to take that offer."

Kris and Jennifer are now close pals, with the former even helping J-Law celebrate her 25th birthday back in 2015.
description: Kris headed to Rhode Island for the Hunger Games actress' star-studded wedding bash with fiance Cooke Maroney
